ownershipDocument.remarks: This Form 4 is the third of five Form 4s being filed by the Reporting Person relating to the same event. The Form 4 has been split into five filings to cover all 138 individual transactions that occurred on two consecutive Transaction Dates, because the SEC's EDGAR filing system limits a single Form 4 to a maximum of 30 separate transactions. Each Form 4 will be filed by the Reporting Person.

ownerSignature.signatureName: By: Aaron Beckman by Power of Attorney For: Elon Musk
